column4: ok how the heck do i turn off  auto mount for my  data disks.
you mean as in hard drives?
harddrive maybe a disk but i am talking dvds
i want to mount my own  dvd thankyou very much
how positively old school of you
my script mounts my dvd reads it and then put that info in a flat file  DB and then ejects the disk. rinse and repeat
i suppose i could try that.
go to "places" and choose cd/dvd creator andlook under >edit>preferences
nothing under places that says cd
